title: When does the alpha client go on live servers?

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have visibility on the on-goings of the alpha client.  Hit up the alpha community through their [alpha boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) for updates on that.  Good luck!
you mean PBE? because i use the ALPHA Client on the normal live servers
